info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:57PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1056 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm with frequent cloud to ground lightning near Yaphank, or over Medford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Shirley, Medford, Manorville, Patchogue, Center Moriches, Westhampton, Farmingville, Mastic, Mastic Beach, Yaphank, Brookhaven National Laboratory, Davis Park, East Patchogue, and Holtsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
